login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to your account to continue

dashboard.description: A modern Learning Management System for multi-center organizations with secure role and permission management.

createAdmin.title: Create Admin
createAdmin.description: Create a new admin account with appropriate permissions

createUser.title: Create User
createUser.description: Create a new user account with appropriate permissions

deleteUser.title: Delete User
deleteUser.message: Are you sure you want to delete {userName}? This will permanently remove the user and all associated data.
deleteUser.removeData: All user data will be removed

createStaff.title: Create Staff
createStaff.description: Create a new staff member account with appropriate permissions

editStaff.title: Edit Staff
editStaff.description: Update staff member information and settings

deleteStaff.title: Delete Staff
deleteStaff.description: Are you sure you want to delete {userName}? This will permanently remove the staff member and all associated data.

activateStaff.title: Activate Staff
activateStaff.description: Are you sure you want to activate {userName}? This will restore their access to the system.

deactivateStaff.title: Deactivate Staff
deactivateStaff.description: Are you sure you want to deactivate {userName}? This will revoke their access to the system.

restoreStaff.title: Restore Staff
restoreStaff.description: Are you sure you want to restore {userName}? This will reactivate their account and restore their access.

deleteRole.title: Delete Role
deleteRole.message: Are you sure you want to delete the role {roleName}? This will permanently remove the role and all associated permissions.
deleteRole.removeRole: Remove the role from the system
deleteRole.revokePermissions: Revoke all permissions associated with this role
deleteRole.removeFromUsers: Remove the role from all users who have it assigned

deleteCenter.title: Delete Center
deleteCenter.message: Are you sure you want to delete the center {centerName}? This will permanently remove the center and all associated data.
deleteCenter.removeCenter: Remove the center from the system
deleteCenter.disassociateUsers: Disassociate all users from this center

manageUsers.title: Manage Users - {centerName}
manageUsers.description: Manage user access for this center. Use the Grant/Revoke buttons to control which users can access this center.

manageAdmins.title: Manage Admins - {centerName}
manageAdmins.description: Manage admin access for this center. Use the Grant/Revoke buttons to control which admins can manage this center.

manageAccess.title: User Access - {userName}
manageAccess.description: Showing users that {userName} can access based on their roles and permissions. Use the Grant/Revoke buttons to manage access.

manageCenterAccess.title: Center Access - {userName}
manageCenterAccess.description: Manage center access for this user. Use the Grant/Revoke buttons to control access to different centers.

manageRoleUsers.title: Manage Role Users - {roleName}
manageRoleUsers.description: Manage user assignments for this role. Use the Grant/Revoke buttons to control which users have this role assigned.

manageAdminRoles.title: Manage Admin Roles
manageAdminRoles.description: Showing admin roles available for {userName} in the system. Use the Assign/Remove buttons to manage admin role assignments.

manageRoles.title: Manage Roles
manageRoles.description: Showing roles available for {userName} in your center. Use the Assign/Remove buttons to manage role assignments.

rolesForCenter.title: Roles for {centerName}
rolesForCenter.description: Showing roles available for {userName} in {centerName}. Use the Assign/Remove buttons to manage role assignments.

createProducts.title: Create New Products
createProducts.description: Create a new products in the system

viewProducts.title: Products Details
viewProducts.description: View detailed information about this products

deleteProducts.title: Delete Products
deleteProducts.message: Are you sure you want to delete {productsName}? This will permanently remove the products and all associated data.
deleteProducts.removeProducts: Remove the products from the system

createBranch.title: Create New Branch
createBranch.description: Create a new branch in the system

viewBranch.title: Branch Details
viewBranch.description: View detailed information about this branch

deleteBranch.title: Delete Branch
deleteBranch.message: Are you sure you want to delete {branchName}? This will permanently remove the branch and all associated data.
deleteBranch.removeBranch: Remove the branch from the system

manageBranchAccess.title: Manage Branch Access - {branchName}
manageBranchAccess.description: Manage user access for the branch {branchName}. Use the Grant/Revoke buttons to control which users can access this branch.

createTestModule.title: Create New TestModule
createTestModule.description: Create a new test-module in the system

viewTestModule.title: TestModule Details
viewTestModule.description: View detailed information about this test-module

deleteTestModule.title: Delete TestModule
deleteTestModule.message: Are you sure you want to delete {test-moduleName}? This will permanently remove the test-module and all associated data.
deleteTestModule.removeTestModule: Remove the test-module from the system

verifyPhone.title: Verify Phone Number
verifyPhone.enterOtpHint: Enter the 6-digit code sent to the phone number

importUser.title: Import User from Another Center
importUser.step1Description: Enter the phone number of the user you want to import. An OTP will be sent to verify the user exists.
importUser.step2Description: Enter the OTP code received via SMS and select the profile type to import the user.
importUser.otpHint: Enter the 6-digit code sent to the phone number
importUser.phoneLocked: Phone number is locked for this import session
importUser.userNotFound: User with this phone number doesn't exist
importUser.userNotFoundDescription: No user found with phone number {phone}. Would you like to create a new user instead?

centerInactive.title: Center Inactive
centerInactive.description: The center itself is currently inactive and cannot be accessed. Please select a different center or contact the administrator to activate this center.

centerAccessDenied.title: Center Access Denied
centerAccessDenied.description: You do not have access to this center. Please contact your administrator to request center access.

centerAccessInactive.title: Center Access Inactive
centerAccessInactive.description: Your access to this center is currently inactive. Please contact the center administrator for more information.

errors.cannotDeleteReadOnlyRole: Cannot delete read-only role. System roles cannot be deleted
errors.cannotModifyReadOnlyRole: Cannot modify read-only role. System roles cannot be modified

profileInactive.title: Profile Inactive
profileInactive.description: The selected profile is currently inactive. Please select another profile or contact an administrator.

errors.userHasNoEmail: User does not have an email address. Please use SMS or WhatsApp channel
errors.userHasNoPhone: User does not have a phone number. Please use EMAIL channel
errors.userAlreadyHasProfileCannotImport: User already has a profile. Cannot import without center access
errors.targetUserMustHaveAdminOrStaffProfile: Target user must have an admin or staff profile to grant center access
errors.invalidProfileTypeForCenterAccess: Only Staff and Admin users can be granted center access
errors.refreshTokenNotFound: Refresh token not found in request body
errors.eitherTargetUserProfileIdOrProfileTypeRe: Either targetUserProfileId or profileType must be provided
errors.phoneAlreadyExists: A user with this phone number already exists
errors.adminScopeNotAllowedForCenter: Admin scope permissions are not allowed for center-specific roles
errors.adminRoleCannotBeAssociatedWithCenter: Admin role cannot be associated with a center. Admin roles are system-wide only
errors.otpCodeRequired: OTP code is required to complete this operation
errors.noAccessToGranterUser: You do not have access to the granter user
errors.noAccessToTargetUser: You do not have access to the target user
errors.superAdminCanAccessAnyUser: Super admin users can access any user and cannot be restricted
errors.branchAccessDenied: You do not have access to this branch
errors.twoFactorNotEnabled: Two-factor authentication is not enabled for this account
errors.twoFactorAlreadyEnabled: Two-factor authentication is already enabled for this account
errors.systemNotReady: System is not ready. Please try again later
errors.adminScopeAccessDenied: You do not have access to admin scope. Please select a center to access center-specific resources.
errors.notAuthorizedToUpdateRole: You are not authorized to update this role
errors.notAuthorizedToDeleteRole: You are not authorized to delete this role
errors.notAuthorizedToAccessRole: You are not authorized to access this role
errors.roleNotDeletedCannotRestore: Role is not deleted and cannot be restored
errors.profileSelectionRequired: Profile selection is required for this operation
errors.notificationNotFoundOrAccessDenied: Notification not found or access denied
errors.userIdRequiredForInAppNotifications: userId is required for in-app notifications
errors.relatedEntityMissingOrInvalid: Related entity is missing or invalid. Please check the referenced data and try again
errors.temporaryDatabaseConflict: Temporary database conflict occurred. Please retry.
errors.emailVerificationMustBeAuthenticated: Email verification must be requested from an authenticated endpoint
